overview:
Victor W. Perry is CEO and Founder of Castbox Media Inc, an online broadcasting network that broadcast live and prerecorded video feeds of news, sports, music videos, fitness and health, and lifestyle shows around the world. The company was found in 2010 (formerly REMIX Broadcasting) in Dallas, TX. Castbox Media Inc is a Texas formed C Corporation with its main studios and headquarters in Dallas, TX.

Victor is also former CEO of ATX Global Inc, a company that designing wireless platforms for multi-tenant units. He was also COEditor-in- Chief of Mahogany Fitness Magazine.
